p: CHT 1:1 and CHT 1:3 reduced oxidative stress by lowering TOS ( p ˂ 0.001) and OSI ( p ˂ 0.001), and CHT by reducing TOS ( p ˂ 0.05), OSI ( p ˂ 0.05), and NOx ( p ˂ 0.05). The CHT samples had no important effect on MDA and SH ( p > 0.05). CHT lowered the transcription factor NF-Kb in a reversed concentration-dependent way, the lower concentrations being more efficient inhibitors.
